title: 343. Q&AF: Family Asking For Money, Making An Employee Partner & Fighting Wokeness In School
itunes:title: 343. Q&AF: Family Asking For Money, Making An Employee Partner & Fighting Wokeness In School
description: In today's episode, Andy answers your questions on how to deal with certain family members who ask you for money once you achieve some financial success, if you should ever consider making one of your top employees a partner, and the best way to revolt against the woke school system.
content:encoded: In today's episode, Andy answers your questions on how to deal with certain family members who ask you for money once you achieve some financial success, if you should ever consider making one of your top employees a partner, and the best way to revolt against the woke school system.
